title: Foreign Policy Analysis Warns of American Kleptocracy Under Trump Administration
summary: Foreign Policy and other analysts published comprehensive assessments highlighting the systematic dismantling of anti-corruption infrastructure during the Trump administration. Key concerns include the closure of the Kleptocracy Asset Recovery Initiative, a six-month pause on Foreign Corrupt Practices Act investigations, and the firing of multiple inspectors general, suggesting a deliberate strategy to weaken democratic accountability mechanisms.
